summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Norris Sand Point Addition, being the alley between 52nd Avenue Northeast and 54th Avenue Northeast from East 68th Street to East 70th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17501 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
